name: Footage Access
description: Footage Access is a web service which will provide university students, faculty and staff with access and licensing rights to informational, entertainment and historical primary-source and relevant archival footage and audio for any educational purpose be that student films, research papers, projects presentations etc. The archives are curated and represent a wide spectrum of educationally relevant content. Archives include HBO, NatGeo, Discovery, NBC Universal, CNN, ABC News, Associated Press. Users must create accounts using their nyu.edu email address.
